 Adarsh English School [Pre Primary, Primary and Secondary]
 Karmaveer Bhaurao Patil Junior College [Arts, Commerce and Science]
 YCMOU Study Center

Adarsh Vikas Mandal was founded in the year 1984 by renowned politician and veteran social worker Late Shree B.B. More Sir to cater to the educational needs of socially and economically challenged section of the society living around the area in particular. The institute established Karmaveer Bhaurao Patil Degree College in the year 2009 for providing quality higher education to aspiring students. \nThe institution provides a learning environment and encourages the students to develop a modern outlook towards life. The college offers traditional as well as professional undergraduate courses like Bachelor of Commerce, Bachelor of Arts, Bachelor of Accounting and Finance, Bachelor of Banking and Insurance, and Bachelor of Science in Information Technology.

The institute established Karmaveer Bhaurao Patil Degree College in the year 2009 for providing quality higher education to aspiring students. \nThe institution provides a learning environment and encourages the students to develop a modern outlook towards life. The college offers traditional as well as professional undergraduate courses like B.Com, B.A,BAF, BBI, and Bsc IT.
